ARTICLE.TITLE: School boards 'frustrated and concerned' by Ford government's reopening plan

METADATA.news_keywords: ontario, health, education, politics, reserve fund, school board, finance, economics, school, class, stephen lecce, scott scantlebury, cathy abraham, fund
METADATA.description: TORONTO - Ontario school boards said Friday their reserve funds are already budgeted for high-priority initiatives not related to the COVID-19 pandemic and should not be used to lower class
METADATA.author: Shawn Jeffords and Nicole Thompson The Canadian Press

og.title: School boards 'frustrated and concerned' by Ford government's reopening plan
